glsa.title: Zebedee: Denial of Service vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A bug in Zebedee allows a remote attacker to perform a Denial of Service attack.

background.p: Zebedee is an application that establishes an encrypted, compressed tunnel for TCP/IP or UDP data transfer between two systems.

description.p: "Shiraishi.M" reported that Zebedee crashes when "0" is received as the port number in the protocol option header.

impact.p: By performing malformed requests a remote attacker could cause Zebedee to crash.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Zebedee users should upgrade to the latest version:
